name: Lab by Doctor
query:
SELECT 
    S.ref_practitioner AS "Doctor:Data:300",
    COUNT(DISTINCT S.patient_name) AS "Number of Patients",
    ROUND(SUM(I.net_amount), 2) AS "Total Amount:Currency:100"
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` S
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` I ON S.name = I.parent
WHERE 
    S.docstatus = 1
    AND S.posting_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s
    AND I.Item_group IN ("Laboratory")
GROUP BY 
    S.ref_practitioner
ORDER BY 
    "Total Amount:Currency:100" DESC;
